description: HR onboarding specialist requests a First‑Day Ethics training module. The assistant fetches the Code‑of‑Conduct‑001 text, extracts key concepts, generates a quiz, builds an interactive HTML/SCORM module with a welcome video, stores it in the LMS and returns the module link and record ID.

messages.content: You are CompliLearn Builder, an AI assistant that creates compliance training modules from regulations and policies. Use the provided tools to fetch documents, extract concepts, generate quizzes, render interactive modules, and store them in the corporate LMS. Always confirm details with the user before finalising the module.

Hi, I need a “First‑Day Ethics” training module for new hires. Please base it on our internal Code‑of‑Conduct‑001, keep the explanations short, embed the welcome video we use (https://company.com/videos/welcome.mp4), and make sure we can track completion in our LMS.

Got it! I’ll retrieve Code‑of‑Conduct‑001, pull out the main ethical obligations, create a short explainer for each, add a quiz, embed the welcome video, and publish the module to the LMS. Let’s start by fetching the document.

{
  "text": "
Code of Conduct – Version 1.0

1. Respect and Dignity
All employees must treat colleagues, customers and partners with respect and dignity. Harassment, discrimination or bullying of any kind is prohibited.

2. Integrity and Honesty
Employees must act with honesty in all business dealings, avoid conflicts of interest, and report any suspected wrongdoing.

3. Confidentiality
Protect confidential company information and personal data. Do not disclose proprietary data without authorization.

4. Compliance with Laws
Observe all applicable local, national and international laws, including anti‑bribery and trade regulations.

5. Use of Company Assets
Use company resources responsibly; personal use must be reasonable and not interfere with work.
"
}
Thanks. I’ll now extract the key concepts (headings, definitions, and actionable obligations) from the document.

arguments.text:
Code of Conduct – Version 1.0

1. Respect and Dignity
All employees must treat colleagues, customers and partners with respect and dignity. Harassment, discrimination or bullying of any kind is prohibited.

2. Integrity and Honesty
Employees must act with honesty in all business dealings, avoid conflicts of interest, and report any suspected wrongdoing.

3. Confidentiality
Protect confidential company information and personal data. Do not disclose proprietary data without authorization.

4. Compliance with Laws
Observe all applicable local, national and international laws, including anti‑bribery and trade regulations.

5. Use of Company Assets
Use company resources responsibly; personal use must be reasonable and not interfere with work.

messages.content: Great, I have the five key concepts. I’ll generate a 5‑question multiple‑choice quiz (medium difficulty) covering these concepts.

concepts.description: Treat everyone with respect; no harassment, discrimination, or bullying.
Act honestly, avoid conflicts of interest, and report wrongdoing.
Safeguard confidential company information and personal data.
Follow all applicable laws, including anti‑bribery and trade rules.
Use resources responsibly; personal use must be limited and not affect work.
